title: Summer Fruits Parcel

ingredients.content: 450 g peaches, cut in 8 pieces (approx. 3 peaches)

preparations.content: Lay a piece of baking paper (38 cm x 45 cm) on work surface. Place fruits in centre of baking paper and sprinkle with cinnamon and brown sugar then fold and seal paper around fruit. Transfer parcel to Varoma dish.

Place water in mixing bowl then place covered Varoma into position. Steam <b>12-14 min/Varoma/speed 1<b> until fruit is soft. Spoon fruit from parcel into serving bowls and serve with ice cream of choice.

hintsAndTricks: If fruit is out of season, frozen fruit can be used; thaw before using.
To make throughout the year use different fruits that are in season and adjust steaming time accordingly.
For 6 individual serving portions, divide fruit between 6 smaller parcels and steam for 10-12 minutes until soft.
